byline.contributor: Sewell Chan contributed reporting from London.

lead_paragraph: The police said a man whom they identified only as a 60-year-old with the surname Cheung admitted starting the blaze and was charged with suspicion of arson.
snippet: The police said a man whom they identified only as a 60-year-old with the surname Cheung admitted starting the blaze and was charged with suspicion of arson....

headline.main: Hong Kong Subway Fire Injures at Least 17 People
